tn.ref: the land was quiet ten years
tn.text: AT: "there was peace in the land for ten years"

tn.ref: in the eyes of Yahweh his God
he took away the high places and the incense altars from all the cities of Judah
tn.text: AT: "Asa had all the shrines and altars that were used for worshiping false gods in Judah destroyed" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_ellipsis]])
AT: "Asa said to the people of Judah" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_synecdoche]] )

tn.ref: we have sought Yahweh our God
tn.text: AT: "we have asked Yahweh our God to help us"
This was a city in Judah.

tn.ref: do not let man defeat you
tn.text: AT: "do not let others defeat your people" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_metonymy]])
